// Errors Sorry, service is not available in Russia and Belarus, please use vpn Service is not available Error An error occurred while the application was running. Try updating the app or try again later
// Toast Messages Whoops! Looks like camera access is needed for this feature. Head to your device settings, find IntelliVerse in your app list, and grant camera permission to unlock the magic! Whoops! To use images from your gallery, IntelliVerse needs permission to read your photos. Head to your device settings, find IntelliVerse in your app list, and grant photo access to unlock the magic! Whoops! To save files to your device, IntelliVerse needs permission to write to your storage. Head to your device settings, find IntelliVerse in your app list, and grant storage access to unlock the magic! Whoops! To access files on your device, IntelliVerse needs permission to read your storage. Head to your device settings, find IntelliVerse in your app list, and grant storage access to unlock the magic! IntelliVerse needs access to your camera so you can instantly snap photos of your school exercises! Allowing access to your photos lets you select images from your gallery to use within the IntelliVerse app! Permission to write to your storage lets the IntelliVerse app save files, like photos you\'ve taken, right to your device! IntelliVerse needs access to your device\'s storage to read files, like photos or documents, that you might want to use in the app.
// Buttons Labels OK
